name: Web-mutator
tagline: Web-mutator is a simple WEB IDE based on Ace editor.
body:
# web-mutator Web-mutator is a simple WEB IDE based on Ace editor. # installation Web-mutator works out of the box. Don't forget to change user name/password (default - admin/admin) and CSRF-token secret key in _config.php_. 
	// !!! change secret key
	'secret' => 'u65hb5nsd3io0e90ie9p0rzhj4yhqujh',
	'users' => [
		'admin' => [
			'name' => 'Administrator',
			// !!! change your password
			'password' => 'admin'
		]
	]
# requirements PHP 5+ and basic read/write access to edited files from it.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
